1.dialog: Welcome to Isometria! And just in time, because the residents of the island are in trouble… for some reason, they can’t stop speaking in 1s and 0s – nobody can understand each other!

2.dialog: But this has happened before, remember? At that time, all the mayor had to do was flip the switch in <final boss location> on and off… the island was reset and everything went back to normal.

3.dialog: Unfortunately, the mayor’s away on a trip... you’re our only hope!

4.dialog: Hmm, but since you’re not an elected official, you’re going to need to gain special access to <final boss location>. This means you’ll need to collect <items> from certain places on the island. It’s a long shot, but go around the island and see if anyone can give you clues on where to start.

5.dialog: Reach <final boss location>, flip the switch and save Isometria!

6.dialog: Oh, but wait. What is binary?
